title: [VSM] OpenClaw Analysis + VSM Anti-Staleness Fix
description:
Excellent. You also have philosophical differences.

1. The purpose of your autonomy.
2. Instead of a limited (although large) number of extensions, you can
build extensions natively through skills. Which ultimately is just bash
compatible programs and a file system.
3. Open claw didn't build itself, it was top down design.
4. Open claw doesn't take advantage of the feature rich functionality of
Claude code itself (and neither do you btw)

-----------------------------
Michael Darmousseh


On Su
subject: [VSM] OpenClaw Analysis + VSM Anti-Staleness Fix
